questions.question: What is the purpose of connecting a resistor to an LED when blinking it with a Raspberry Pi?

answers.a: To limit current and protect the LED and GPIO pin
answers.b: To increase the brightness of the LED

questions.question: Can you supply power to Raspberry Pi via GPIO 5V pin?
What should you do before connecting hardware components to a Raspberry Pi?

answers.a: Ensure the Raspberry Pi is turned off
answers.b: Keep the Raspberry Pi powered on
